verses.verse: God <S%H430><s%> of my praise, <S%H8416><s%> don't <S%H2790><s%> remain silent,

for they have opened <S%H6605><s%> the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> and the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of deceit <S%H4820><s%> against me. <S%H1696><s%> They have spoken to me with a lying <S%H8267><s%> tongue. <S%H3956><s%>
They have also surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me with words <S%H1697><s%> of hatred, <S%H8135><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> against me without a cause. <S%H2600><s%>
In return for my love, <S%H160><s%> they are my adversaries; <S%H7853><s%> but I am in prayer. <S%H8605><s%>
They have rewarded <S%H7760><s%> me evil <S%H7451><s%> for good, <S%H2896><s%> and hatred <S%H8135><s%> for my love. <S%H160><s%>
Set <S%H6485><s%> a wicked man <S%H7563><s%> over him. <S%H7854><s%> Let an adversary stand <S%H5975><s%> at his right hand. <S%H3225><s%>
When he is judged, <S%H8199><s%> let him come forth <S%H3318><s%> guilty. <S%H7563><s%> Let his prayer <S%H8605><s%> be turned into sin. <S%H2401><s%>
Let his days <S%H3117><s%> be few. <S%H4592><s%> Let another <S%H312><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> his office. <S%H6486><s%>
Let his children <S%H1121><s%> be fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and his wife <S%H802><s%> a widow. <S%H490><s%>
Let his children <S%H1121><s%> be wandering <S%H5128><s%> beggars. <S%H5128><s%> <S%H7592><s%> Let them be sought <S%H1875><s%> from their ruins. <S%H2723><s%>
Let the creditor <S%H5383><s%> seize <S%H5367><s%> all that he has. <S%H2114><s%> Let strangers plunder <S%H962><s%> the fruit of his labor. <S%H3018><s%>
Let there be no one to extend <S%H4900><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to him, <S%H2603><s%> neither let there be anyone to have pity on his fatherless children. <S%H3490><s%>
Let his posterity <S%H319><s%> be cut off. <S%H3772><s%> In the generation <S%H1755><s%> following <S%H312><s%> let their name <S%H8034><s%> be blotted out. <S%H4229><s%>
Let the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%> be remembered <S%H2142><s%> by Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Don't <S%H2403><s%> let the sin of his mother <S%H517><s%> be blotted out. <S%H4229><s%>
Let them be before Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> that he may cut off <S%H3772><s%> their memory <S%H2143><s%> from the earth; <S%H776><s%>

because he didn't <S%H2142><s%> remember to show <S%H6213><s%> kindness, <S%H2617><s%> but persecuted <S%H7291><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> the broken <S%H3512><s%> in heart, <S%H3824><s%> to kill them. <S%H4191><s%>
Yes, <S%H157><s%> he loved cursing, <S%H7045><s%> and it came <S%H935><s%> to him. <S%H2654><s%> He didn't delight in blessing, <S%H1293><s%> and it was far from him. <S%H7368><s%>

He clothed <S%H3847><s%> himself also with cursing <S%H7045><s%> as with his garment. <S%H4055><s%> It came <S%H935><s%> into his inward <S%H7130><s%> parts like water, <S%H4325><s%> like oil <S%H8081><s%> into his bones. <S%H6106><s%>
Let it be to him as the clothing <S%H899><s%> with which he covers <S%H5844><s%> himself, <S%H4206><s%> for the belt that is always <S%H8548><s%> around him. <S%H2296><s%>
This is the reward <S%H6468><s%> of my adversaries <S%H7853><s%> from Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> of those who speak <S%H1696><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

But deal <S%H6213><s%> with me, <S%H136><s%> Yahweh the Lord, <S%H136><s%> for your name <S%H8034><s%>'s sake, <S%H2617><s%> because your loving kindness is good, <S%H2896><s%> deliver me; <S%H5337><s%>
for I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> is wounded <S%H2490><s%> within me. <S%H7130><s%>
I fade away <S%H1980><s%> like an evening <S%H5186><s%> shadow. <S%H6738><s%> I am shaken off <S%H5287><s%> like a locust. <S%H697><s%>
My knees <S%H1290><s%> are weak <S%H3782><s%> through fasting. <S%H6685><s%> My body <S%H1320><s%> is thin <S%H3584><s%> and lacks fat. <S%H8081><s%>
I have also become a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to them. <S%H7200><s%> When they see me, <S%H5128><s%> they shake their head. <S%H7218><s%>
Help <S%H5826><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, my God. <S%H430><s%> Save <S%H3467><s%> me according to your loving kindness; <S%H2617><s%>
that they may know <S%H3045><s%> that this is your hand; <S%H3027><s%> that you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have done it. <S%H6213><s%>
They may curse, <S%H7043><s%> but you bless. <S%H1288><s%> When they arise, <S%H6965><s%> they will be shamed, <S%H954><s%> but your servant <S%H5650><s%> shall rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>
Let my adversaries <S%H7853><s%> be clothed <S%H3847><s%> with dishonor. <S%H3639><s%> Let them cover <S%H5844><s%> themselves with their own shame <S%H1322><s%> as with a robe. <S%H4598><s%>
I will give great <S%H3966><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> with my mouth. <S%H6310><s%> Yes, <S%H1984><s%> I will praise him among <S%H8432><s%> the multitude. <S%H7227><s%>
For he will stand <S%H5975><s%> at the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of the needy, <S%H34><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> him from those who judge <S%H8199><s%> his soul. <S%H5315><s%>
